page.title: 14CLUBS
page.content: We have 16 different clubs in the village. At the village hall there is a Youth Club on Tuesday evenings. Pre-school Playgroup is held on 4 mornings a week, the Mother & Toddler group on Friday mornings, the Ballroom Dancing Club on Wednesday evenings and the Women's Institute on the 2nd Wednesday in the month. In the Scout Hut are the Scouts on Mondays, Cubs on Tuesdays, Brownies on Wednesdays. The guides meet at the school on Mondays. The Cricket and Football Clubs meet in the Sports and Social Club which is in the pavillion at the playing field. The Royal British Legion meet once a month at the Prince Of Wales and the Elderly Household Club meets every other Tuesday in the Lounge at Johnstone Close. There are Skittles and Darts Clubs in the two local pubs, and a Pigeon Club at the Swan.
